data.name: Zarktor's Realm
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game



Zarktor's Realm is a beautiful open-world RPG adventure set in medieval England, Scotland, and Wales. Explore the world on horseback, uncover Arthurian legends, and battle hordes of the undead. Using melee, ranged, and magical combat to overcome incredibly powerful entities will enable your guaranteed victory. Gather new weapons, use powerful shards to upgrade them, and solve complex quests with multiple outcomes. Will you become the next legend?



Explore 6th Century Britain during the Volcanic Winter of 536 AD and the Plague of Justinian - arguably one of the worst periods in history to be alive. See Post-Roman settlements and epic castles spread between England, Scotland, and Wales. A truly Immersive and a stunningly detailed game world is presented, showcasing realism and beauty in this fantasy tale.



Choose your starting character from a lineup of Knights, Warriors, Templars, Assassins, Mages, or the Hunter and their sister, the Necromancer. Each has a unique backstory, different skills, and dialogue choices for varied role play.

Master various forms of combat: Ranged, melee, technology, and magic. Use these to unlock your true potential and take on hordes of the undead, hunt wild beasts, and take down a corrupted hierarchy of powerful evil that stands in your way and threatens the world.



Search castles, dungeons, catacombs, and caves for clues to solve complex quests entwined in mystery and intrigue. Along the way, make sure to retrieve powerful magical items once lost, and many other items to collect, craft, and trade.



Experience a rich and engaging storyline that interweaves real events that actually occurred in the 6th Century, alongside those in the world of Zarktor's Realm. With branching dialogue options, and multiple different conversation outcomes, the decisions you make will affect the world around you. With the ability to experience Zarktor's Realm in multiple ways, the dungeons that generate with each play through are randomized so each combat experience is just as unique as the dialog.

Features


  • Mind-blowing graphics, dynamic weather and special effects.
  • Experience real world locations and events in medieval England, Scotland, and Wales.
  • Choose from one of 12 characters as your starting point and experience the story through their eyes.
  • Customize your character and collect pets and mounts to make it your own journey.
  • Unlock skill trees and magical abilities.
  • Choose your style of gameplay from dialogue choices to weapon loadout and equipment.
  • Talk your way out of trouble or let your weapons and spells do the talking for you. The choice is yours.
  • Fight on foot or on horseback.
  • Multiple difficulty levels.

data.short_description: Zarktor's Realm is an open-world RPG adventure set in medieval Great Britain. Explore the vast world, uncover Arthurian legends, and battle hordes of the undead. Gather new weapons, use powerful shards to upgrade them, and solve complex quests with multiple outcomes. Will you become the next legend?
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 3 Ghz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, 4GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 480)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Initial guide only - Specification being tested
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 4 Ghz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, 6GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Initial guide only - Specification being tested

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14.6 or later
  • Processor: 3 Ghz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M295X 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Initial guide only - Specification being tested
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14.6 or later
  • Processor: 4 Ghz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M295X 4GB or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Initial guide only - Specification being tested

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Debian 8 "Jessie" + SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor 3Ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA, AMD Radeon 8500 or later
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Initial guide only - Specification being tested
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Debian 8 "Jessie" + SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor 4Ghz or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA, AMD Radeon 8500 or later
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Initial guide only - Specification being tested

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

This may include:
Blood and Gore
Intense Violence
Strong Language
Adult Themes
